main event: On December 6, 1960, a radar observation reported a high-speed object with a white and reddish glow descending vertically at high speed.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 6-7 seconds, The object descended to about 8,000 feet before fading out, The object was observed using ground radar, The observation concluded it was related to known aerospace activity, Four experienced naval seamen confirmed the sighting.
sighted object: a white with reddish glow object
